sentence: Rose Breaks His Silence New York Knicks president Leon Rose, GM Scott Perry and head coach Tom Thibodeau pose for photos with Kemba Walker and Evan Fournier during their introductory press conference.

title: Knicks President Breaks Silence on Mitchell Robinson’s Future
